tutorials.title: How to speak so that people want to listen
tutorials.author: Julian Treasure
tutorials.description: Have you ever felt like you're talking, but nobody is listening? Here's Julian Treasure to help you fix that. As the sound expert demonstrates some useful vocal exercises and shares tips on how to speak with empathy, he offers his vision for a sonorous world of listening and understanding.

tutorials.title: Think Fast, Talk Smart: Communication Techniques
tutorials.author: Matt Abrahams
tutorials.description: Communication is critical to success in business and life. Concerned about an upcoming interview? Anxious about being asked to give your thoughts during a meeting? Founder of TFTS communication, Matt Abrahams, is here to help.

tutorials.title: The 3 Magic Ingredients of Amazing Talks
tutorials.author: Phil Waknell
tutorials.description: Some people are great speakers. But what makes them great? Are they born that way, or can anyone learn the magic of amazing talks? Phil Waknell, a presentation coach, has analysed hundreds of great talks and great speakers. In this talk, he will share the three magic ingredients that you can use to make your next talk amazing.

tutorials.title: How to Nail Your Job Interview
tutorials.author: Google
tutorials.description: In this video, we'll walk you through the steps of preparing for a job interview, from understanding the role and company to practicing your answers and following up afterward.

tutorials.title: Body Language, the Hidden Language
tutorials.author: BBC REEL
tutorials.description: It's often said that our bodies speak louder than our words. But how much of what we 'say' is non-verbal? And how can we use body language to our advantage? In this video, we'll explore the hidden language of our bodies, and how it can be used to communicate more effectively.

tutorials.title: How to Win a Group Discussion
tutorials.author: Anubhav Singh
tutorials.description: Group discussions are a common part of the selection process for many jobs and academic programs. In this video, we'll share some tips and tricks on how to win a group discussion, from preparing your arguments to presenting them effectively.
